data.message: All of the people hating on Em now must of forget when he made "mosh" when Bush was in office. Dude has always had liberal views and if your just now noticing you must've not been a fan to begin with. I don't particularly care either way about this freestyle but damn folks get so butthurt over OPINIONS nowadays!!!

replies.message:
For reals lol these noobs getting all butt hurt about this probably didn't get nearly so butt hurt when he was talking about Bush, is anything he saying wrong exactly?

What about White America? lol
Also on the song with Busta Rhymes he said He is a rich Democrat. How...surprising.

Mosh was thoughtful and had a message even though it was very poorly written. This freestyle was just him rambling and hurling insults and sucking up to black people. It was very ineffective and childish.

The problem is, these idiot Trump supporters weren't into politics until the orange fascist got nominated. So they didn't care about Em's political views or comments until their Uncle Daddy Trump got into office.
views aside this was weak and too forced... definitely not his best work
What pissed me off is being told FUCK YOU by an excellent performer that I've admired since 99.
when you say butthurt you are talking about eminem right?
Shelly Brown-Rainey no. we never cared about eminem period...

He wasn't happy when Bill was in office either........Sooooo I think the deal is he is hanging out with these youngsters trying to stay relevant! Favorite rapper of all time just told me to fuck off pretty awesome. 🖕
